author: CBS News
title: Watch live: New York governor gives coronavirus update
description: Deaths and hospitalizations are down but Cuomo warned that New Yorkers need to stay vigilant to curb the spread of the virus.
content:
New York Governor Andrew Cuomo is giving an update Monday on the state's response to the coronavirus pandemic. On Sunday, Cuomo said all indications are New York has passed the high point of coronavirus cases and are on the descent.
"If the data holds, and t… [+895 chars]
